stateDiagram

State_Tilted

State_Tilted : State_Tilted

State_Tilted : enter / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

State_Tilted : enter / #123; StopUVLed()#59; #125;

State_Tilted : enter / #123; StopCarbonation()#59; #125;

State_Tilted : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_Malfunction)#59; #125;

state State_AutomaticMode {

        State_Rinsing

        State_Rinsing : State_Rinsing

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; ButtonsFunction(false)#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_RinsingStart)#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; pumpStopsOnSensor = true#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; SolenoidPumpUVPower(1)#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; StartWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; ResetFilterDaysCounter()#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; StartWaterPumpingTimer()#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : enter / #123; StartUVLEd()#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : exit / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_Rinsing : exit / #123; StopUVLed()#59; #125;

        State_ExitFilteringOnly

        State_ExitFilteringOnly : State_ExitFilteringOnly

        State_ExitFilteringOnly : enter / #123; SolenoidPumpUVPower(0)#59; #125;

        State_ExitFilteringOnly : enter / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_ExitFilteringOnly : enter / #123; StopUVLed()#59; #125;

        state State_Carbonating {

                State_Start_Carbonating

                State_Start_Carbonating : State_Start_Carbonating

                State_Start_Carbonating : enter / #123; SolenoidPumpUVPower(1)#59; #125;

                State_Start_Carbonating : enter / #123; ButtonsFunction(false)#59; #125;

                State_Start_Carbonating : enter / #123; StartCarbonation()#59; #125;

                State_Start_Carbonating : enter / #123; carbCycle = 0#59; #125;

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as State_Carbonating.(InitialState)

                State_Carbonating_on

                State_Carbonating_on : State_Carbonating_on

                State_Carbonating_on : enter / #123; StartCarbStageTimer(true)#59; #125;

                State_Carbonating_on : enter / #123; SolenoidPump(1)#59; #125;

                State_Carbonating_off

                State_Carbonating_off : State_Carbonating_off

                State_Carbonating_off : enter / #123; StartCarbStageTimer(false)#59; #125;

                State_Carbonating_off : enter / #123; SolenoidPump(0)#59; #125;

                State_Carbonating_off : exit / #123; carbCycle++#59; #125;

                state State_Carbonating.(ChoicePoint)() <>

                State_CarbLeds

                State_CarbLeds : State_CarbLeds

                State_CarbLeds : enter / #123; SetMakeADrinkInProgress(true)#59; #125;

                State_CarbLeds : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_StartMakeDring)#59; #125;

                State_FilterToCarbDelay

                State_FilterToCarbDelay : State_FilterToCarbDelay

                State_FilterToCarbDelay : enter / #123; StartFilterToCarbDelay()#59; #125;

        }

        State_Exit_Carbonating

        State_Exit_Carbonating : State_Exit_Carbonating

        State_Exit_Carbonating : enter / #123; StopCarbonation()#59; #125;

        State_Exit_Carbonating : enter / #123; SolenoidPumpUVPower(0)#59; #125;

        State_Filtering

        State_Filtering : State_Filtering

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; SetMakeADrinkInProgress(true)#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; ButtonsFunction(false)#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_StartMakeDring)#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; SolenoidPumpUVPower(1)#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; StartUVLEd()#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; pumpStopsOnSensor = true#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; StartWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : enter / #123; StartWaterPumpingTimer()#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : exit / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_Filtering : exit / #123; StopUVLed()#59; #125;

        state State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)() <>

        state State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)() <>

        State_MakeDrinkDone

        State_MakeDrinkDone : State_MakeDrinkDone

        State_MakeDrinkDone : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_DoneMakeDring)#59; #125;

        State_SetLevel

        State_SetLevel : State_SetLevel

        State_SetLevel : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_CO2Level)#59; #125;

        state State_Awake {

                State_Ready

                State_Ready : State_Ready

                State_Ready : enter / #123; StartReadyTimer()#59; #125;

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as State_Awake.(InitialState)

                State_Splash

                State_Splash : State_Splash

                State_Splash : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_Splash)#59; #125;

                State_Splash : enter / #123; ButtonsFunction(true)#59; #125;

                state State_Awake.(ChoicePoint)() <>

                State_ShowFilterStatus

                State_ShowFilterStatus : State_ShowFilterStatus

                State_ShowFilterStatus : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_CheckFilterStatus)#59; #125;

        }

        State_Sleeping

        State_Sleeping : State_Sleeping

        State_Sleeping : enter / #123; ButtonsFunction(false)#59; #125;

        State_Sleeping : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_allOff)#59; #125;

        state State_OOTBSetup {

                State_OOTBCO2Down

                State_OOTBCO2Down : State_OOTBCO2Down

                State_OOTBCO2Down : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_OOTBCO2Down)#59; #125;

                State_OOTBDisplayStatus

                State_OOTBDisplayStatus : State_OOTBDisplayStatus

                State_OOTBDisplayStatus : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_OOTBStatus)#59; #125;

                State_OOTBDisplayStatus : enter / #123; ButtonsFunction(true)#59; #125;

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as State_OOTBSetup.(InitialState)

                State_Startup

                State_Startup : State_Startup

                State_Startup : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_Splash)#59; #125;

                State_Startup : enter / #123; ButtonsFunction(false)#59; #125;

                State_SpashInterrupted

                State_SpashInterrupted : State_SpashInterrupted

                State_SpashInterrupted : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_allOff)#59; #125;

                State_OOTBFilterWarning

                State_OOTBFilterWarning : State_OOTBFilterWarning

                State_OOTBFilterWarning : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_FIlterWarning)#59; #125;

                State_OOTBFilterDown

                State_OOTBFilterDown : State_OOTBFilterDown

                State_OOTBFilterDown : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_OOTBFilterDown)#59; #125;

                State_OOTBSetLevel

                State_OOTBSetLevel : State_OOTBSetLevel

                State_OOTBSetLevel : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_CO2Warning)#59; #125;

                State_OOTBClearCO2Warn

                State_OOTBClearCO2Warn : State_OOTBClearCO2Warn

                State_OOTBClearCO2Warn : enter / #123; ClearCO2OOTBFlag()#59; #125;

                State_OOTBClearCO2Warn : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_StartUpCO2)#59; #125;

        }

        state State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)(OOTBorNormal) <>

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as State_AutomaticMode.(InitialState)

        state State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)() <>

        State_ShowStatus

        State_ShowStatus : State_ShowStatus

        State_ShowStatus : enter / #123; SetMakeADrinkInProgress(false)#59; #125;

        State_ShowStatus : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_Status)#59; #125;

        State_ShowStatus : enter / #123; ButtonsFunction(true)#59; #125;

        State_ResetCO2Counter

        State_ResetCO2Counter : State_ResetCO2Counter

        State_ResetCO2Counter : enter / #123; RestartCO2Counter()#59; #125;

        State_ResetCO2Counter : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_CO2WarnOff)#59; #125;

        State_ResetFilterWarning

        State_ResetFilterWarning : State_ResetFilterWarning

        State_ResetFilterWarning : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_FilterWarnOff)#59; #125;

        State_Solenoid_Off

        State_Solenoid_Off : State_Solenoid_Off

        State_Solenoid_Off : enter / #123; SolenoidPump(0)#59; #125;

        State_RinsingEndLeds

        State_RinsingEndLeds : State_RinsingEndLeds

        State_RinsingEndLeds : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_RinsingEnd)#59; #125;

}

State_SafetyFail

State_SafetyFail : State_SafetyFail

State_SafetyFail : enter / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

State_SafetyFail : enter / #123; StopUVLed()#59; #125;

State_SafetyFail : enter / #123; StopCarbonation()#59; #125;

State_SafetyFail : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_SafetyError)#59; #125;

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

State_HWWatchdog

State_HWWatchdog : State_HWWatchdog

State_HWWatchdog : enter / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

State_HWWatchdog : enter / #123; StopUVLed()#59; #125;

State_HWWatchdog : enter / #123; StopCarbonation()#59; #125;

State_HWWatchdog : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_HWWatchdog)#59; #125;

state State_GUIControlMode {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as State_GUIControlMode.(InitialState)

        state State_GUIControlMode.(ChoicePoint)() <>

        State_StopWaterPump

        State_StopWaterPump : State_StopWaterPump

        State_StopWaterPump : enter / #123; StopWaterPump()#59; #125;

        State_StopWaterPump : enter / #123; SendDonePumpOK()#59; #125;

        State_StopWaterPump : enter / #123; pumpStopsOnSensor = false#59; #125;

        State_GuiModeWaitCommands

        State_GuiModeWaitCommands : State_GuiModeWaitCommands

        State_GuiModeWaitCommands : enter / #123; LedsSequence(LEDS_allOff)#59; #125;

}

State_Tilted --> State_HWWatchdog : Event_HWWatchdog

State_Tilted --> State_SafetyFail : Event_SafetyFail

State_Tilted --> State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)(OOTBorNormal) : do [! Tilted()]

State_AutomaticMode --> State_Tilted : do [Tilted()]

State_AutomaticMode --> State_HWWatchdog : Event_HWWatchdog

State_AutomaticMode --> State_SafetyFail : Event_SafetyFail

State_AutomaticMode --> State_GUIControlMode : Event_Enter_GUI_Controlled_Mode

State_Rinsing --> State_RinsingEndLeds : do [IsBottleFull()||WaterPumpTimerExpired()]

State_Rinsing --> State_RinsingEndLeds : Event_AnyKeyPress

State_ExitFilteringOnly --> State_MakeDrinkDone : do

State_Carbonating --> State_Solenoid_Off : Event_AnyKeyPress

State_Start_Carbonating --> State_Carbonating_on : do

State_Carbonating.(InitialState) --> State_Start_Carbonating

State_Carbonating_on --> State_Carbonating_off : do [CarbonationOnCycleExpired(carbCycle)]

State_Carbonating_off --> State_Carbonating.(ChoicePoint)() : do [CarbonationOffCycleExpired(carbCycle)]

State_Carbonating.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_Carbonating_on : else

State_Carbonating.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_Exit_Carbonating : [IsCarbonationLastCycle(carbCycle)]

State_CarbLeds --> State_Start_Carbonating : do

State_FilterToCarbDelay --> State_Start_Carbonating : do [FilterToCarbDelayDone()]

State_Exit_Carbonating --> State_MakeDrinkDone : do

State_Filtering --> State_ExitFilteringOnly : do [WaterPumpTimerExpired()]

State_Filtering --> State_ExitFilteringOnly : Event_AnyKeyPress

State_Filtering --> State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)() : do [IsBottleFull()]

State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_Filtering : else

State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)() : [IsBottleFull()]

State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_ExitFilteringOnly : else

State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_FilterToCarbDelay : [CarbonationEnabled()]

State_MakeDrinkDone --> State_ShowStatus : do [!IsLedsSequencePlaying()]

State_SetLevel --> State_Ready : do

State_Awake --> State_SetLevel : Event_CarbLevelShortPressed

State_Awake --> State_ResetFilterWarning : Event_FilterButtonLongPressed

State_Awake --> State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)() : Event_PrimaryButtonPressed

State_Awake --> State_ResetCO2Counter : Event_CarbLevelLongPressed

State_Ready --> State_ShowFilterStatus : Event_FilterButtonShortPressed

State_Ready --> State_Sleeping : do [ReadyTimerExpired()&&(!IsAnyKeyPressed())]

State_Awake.(InitialState) --> State_Splash

State_Splash --> State_Awake.(ChoicePoint)() : do [!IsLedsSequencePlaying()]

State_Awake.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_Ready : [IsFilterTimeOK()]

State_Awake.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_ShowFilterStatus : else

State_ShowFilterStatus --> State_Ready : do

State_Sleeping --> State_Awake : Event_AnyKeyPress

State_OOTBCO2Down --> State_OOTBSetLevel : Event_CarbLevelShortPressed

State_OOTBCO2Down --> State_OOTBClearCO2Warn : Event_CarbLevelLongPressed

State_OOTBDisplayStatus --> State_OOTBCO2Down : Event_CarbLevelDown

State_OOTBDisplayStatus --> State_OOTBFilterDown : Event_FilterDown

State_OOTBSetup.(InitialState) --> State_Startup

State_Startup --> State_OOTBDisplayStatus : do [!IsLedsSequencePlaying()]

State_Startup --> State_SpashInterrupted : Event_AnyKeyPress

State_SpashInterrupted --> State_OOTBDisplayStatus : do [!IsLedsSequencePlaying()]

State_OOTBFilterWarning --> State_OOTBDisplayStatus : do [!IsLedsSequencePlaying()]

State_OOTBFilterDown --> State_OOTBFilterWarning : Event_FilterButtonShortPressed

State_OOTBFilterDown --> State_Rinsing : Event_FilterButtonLongPressed

State_OOTBSetLevel --> State_OOTBDisplayStatus : do [!IsLedsSequencePlaying()]

State_OOTBClearCO2Warn --> State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)(OOTBorNormal) : do [!IsLedsSequencePlaying()]

State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)(OOTBorNormal) --> State_OOTBSetup : [IsOOTBState()]

State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)(OOTBorNormal) --> State_Awake : else

State_AutomaticMode.(InitialState) --> State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)(OOTBorNormal)

State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_MakeDrinkDone : else

State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_CarbLeds : [CarbonationEnabled()]

State_ShowStatus --> State_Ready : do

State_ResetCO2Counter --> State_Awake : do [!IsLedsSequencePlaying()]

State_ResetFilterWarning --> State_Rinsing : do [!IsLedsSequencePlaying()]

State_Solenoid_Off --> State_Exit_Carbonating : do

State_RinsingEndLeds --> State_AutomaticMode.(ChoicePoint)(OOTBorNormal) : do [!IsLedsSequencePlaying()]

ROOT.(InitialState) --> State_AutomaticMode

State_GUIControlMode --> State_AutomaticMode : Event_Exit_GUI_Controlled_Mode

State_GUIControlMode --> State_HWWatchdog : Event_HWWatchdog

State_GUIControlMode.(InitialState) --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands

State_GUIControlMode.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_StopWaterPump : [pumpStopsOnSensor]

State_GUIControlMode.(ChoicePoint)() --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands : else

State_StopWaterPump --> State_GuiModeWaitCommands : do

State_GuiModeWaitCommands --> State_GUIControlMode.(ChoicePoint)() : Event_BottleFullSensor
Events
settings
